message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose specifics at this time, I can assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me.  I'm confident it will be even more valuable to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.  This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully.  If you're interested, let's schedule a meeting to discuss further.
